mapper.update: update l_contracttype set conttypeid=conttypeid ,conttypecode=#{conttypecode} ,conttypename=#{conttypename} ,buysellflag=#{buysellflag} where conttypeid=#{conttypeid}

update l_contracttype set conttypeid=conttypeid ,conttypecode=#{conttypecode} ,conttypename=#{conttypename} ,buysellflag=#{buysellflag} where 1=1 and conttypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and conttypeid =#{Where_Id} and conttypeid=#{Where_conttypeid} and conttypecode=#{Where_conttypecode} and conttypename=#{Where_conttypename} and buysellflag=#{Where_buysellflag}
mapper.select: select t.conttypeid "conttypeid", t.conttypecode "conttypecode", t.conttypename "conttypename", t.buysellflag "buysellflag" from l_contracttype t where conttypeid=#{conttypeid}

select t.conttypeid "conttypeid", t.conttypecode "conttypecode", t.conttypename "conttypename", t.buysellflag "buysellflag" from l_contracttype t where 1=1 and t.conttypeid=#{conttypeid} and t.conttypecode=#{conttypecode} and t.conttypename=#{conttypename} and t.buysellflag=#{buysellflag}

select t.conttypeid "conttypeid", t.conttypecode "conttypecode", t.conttypename "conttypename", t.buysellflag "buysellflag" from l_contracttype t where 1=1 and t.conttypeid=#{conttypeid} and t.conttypecode=#{conttypecode} and t.conttypename=#{conttypename} and t.buysellflag=#{buysellflag}
mapper.delete: delete from l_contracttype where 1=1 and conttypeid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and conttypeid =#{Where_Id} and conttypeid=#{Where_conttypeid} and conttypecode=#{Where_conttypecode} and conttypename=#{Where_conttypename} and buysellflag=#{Where_buysellflag}
mapper.select: select t.conttypeid "conttypeid", t.conttypecode "conttypecode", t.conttypename "conttypename", t.buysellflag "buysellflag" from l_contracttype t where 1=1 and t.conttypeid=#{conttypeid} and t.conttypecode=#{conttypecode} and t.conttypename=#{conttypename} and t.buysellflag=#{buysellflag}

select count(*) from l_contracttype t where 1=1 and t.conttypeid=#{conttypeid} and t.conttypeid!=#{noid} and t.conttypecode=#{conttypecode} and t.conttypename=#{conttypename} and t.buysellflag=#{buysellflag}
select count(*) from l_contracttype where 1=1 and conttypename=#{conttypename} and conttypeid!=#{conttypeid}
